name: Monster Jump!
description:
Being a monster can be hard sometimes...                                                                              especially when people shoot arrows at you for no reason at all! Good thing you have special monster powers that help you dodging all of them...

The theme of this week's game: JUMP

                                                Credits

Game Art / Programming by: Justin Neumann (Me) 

Music by: Komiku

Special thanks to: Awesome Tuts & Martin Bremer                                                                          for helping me out with the game programming

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game-A-Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
